title: The African tech firm hoping to power space missions
description: Hypernova hopes that its thruster technology will be adopted on thousands of future small satellites.

description: London-born Jeymes Samuel directs Regina King and Idris Elba in The Harder They Fall.

title: 'I don’t want to live, my mental health’s that bad'

title: Signs of first planet found outside our galaxy
description: Astronomers have found hints of what could be the first planet ever to be discovered outside our galaxy.

description: Critics say Oscar winner Chloe Zhao's first superhero film is "watchable but ultimately unmemorable".

description: Google says its latest smartphone can erase unwanted objects and people from photographs.

title: National Living Wage set to rise to £9.50 an hour
description: The 6.6% pay rise for workers aged 23 years old and over is expected to be announced in the Budget.
